data.title: Welcome to Sharon Country Inn Sharon, CT
data.text:
Welcome to our Inn

Welcome to the Sharon Country Inn—and our new Annex—located in beautiful Sharon, Connecticut, in Litchfield County, the heart of picture-postcard New England. Traveling to us from any direction will take your breath away, scenic mile after scenic mile.

Getting here is easy by car, bus, or train. We are close to the northern-most stop on the MetroNorth line out of Grand Central Terminal in Manhattan. Many bus lines in both CT and MA run nearby on a regular basis, and, we have local taxi service. Directions

During Your Stay

While you are here, you can enjoy many New England attractions and traditions unique to Connecticut and the nearby Berkshires of Massachusetts. The famous Hudson Valley of New York is also right next door.

Participate in an array of seasonal activities from racecar driving and race watching, to annual ski jump competition, summer stock theater, and much more! Comfortable and attractive rooms with modern amenities are waiting for you…

Come stay at Sharon Country Inn, relax and really enjoy!
